ST. LOUIS - Columbia publisher William Switzler was named one of 22 delegates to the Republican National Convention in Baltimore as part of a delegation pledged to support the nomination of President Abraham Lincoln for a second term .
Switzler took part in the opening session the day before but did not attend the concluding session , when national delegates and the platform were approved .

A1: President Abraham Lincoln for a second term

The army would turn and march to meet the enemy , troops were told .
